premiumMaterials.title: Premium Materials
premiumMaterials.description: Exclusive use of certified 3M, Hexis, and Avery films for maximum durability and a flawless finish.

perfectProcessing.title: Perfect Processing
perfectProcessing.description: Every detail is executed with the highest precision and craftsmanship to ensure a flawless result.

fastExecution.title: Fast Execution
fastExecution.description: Efficient processes ensure minimal downtime while maintaining maximum quality, so you can get back on the road quickly.

warranty.title: 5-Year Warranty
warranty.description: Comprehensive warranty on materials and workmanship for your peace of mind.

modernTechnology.title: State-of-the-Art Technology
modernTechnology.description: Use of the latest technologies and tools for optimal results and long-lasting wraps.

consultation.title: Personalized Consultation
consultation.description: Tailored advice and customized solutions to meet your individual needs and desires.

services.title: OUR SERVICES
services.subtitle: Professional Vehicle Refinement with Premium Materials

carWrapping.title: Full Car Wrap
carWrapping.description: Complete vehicle wrapping with premium films from 3M, Avery, or Hexis. Includes warranty and professional consultation.
carWrapping.fullDescription: Our full wrap transforms your vehicle entirely with high-quality films. We offer a wide range of colors and finishes, from matte to glossy, metallic, or with special effects.

windowTinting.title: Window Tinting
windowTinting.description: High-quality window tinting for UV protection and an elegant appearance. Certified films with maximum durability.
windowTinting.fullDescription: Professional window tinting with high-quality films for optimal UV protection, glare reduction, and an elegant appearance. All tints comply with legal regulations.

paintProtection.title: Paint Protection Film
paintProtection.description: Transparent protective film for maximum paint protection. Specifically designed for stone chips and other external impacts.
paintProtection.fullDescription: Protect your paint with our high-quality paint protection film. The transparent film offers maximum protection against stone chips, scratches, and environmental damage while remaining virtually invisible.

designWrapping.title: Design Wrapping
designWrapping.description: Custom design wrapping tailored to your preferences. From partial to full wraps in all colors and effects.
designWrapping.fullDescription: Bring your unique design ideas to life with our custom design wrapping. From subtle accents to bold full designs, we professionally execute your vision.

chromeWrapping.title: Chrome Wrapping
chromeWrapping.description: Elegant chrome wrapping for a unique look. Various shades and effects available.
chromeWrapping.fullDescription: Make a statement with our chrome wrapping. Choose from various chrome effects and shades for a guaranteed head-turner.

commercialWrapping.title: Commercial Wrapping
commercialWrapping.description: Professional vehicle branding and advertising wraps for your business. Corporate design and logo integration.
commercialWrapping.fullDescription: Transform your fleet into mobile advertisements. We professionally implement your corporate design, ensuring a consistent and high-quality appearance.

footer.brandDescription: Your first choice for professional vehicle refinement and wrapping in the region. We stand for quality, precision, and customer satisfaction.
